name: I work at the supermarket but got asked out on a date by a cutie!
name_original: I work at the supermarket but got asked out on a date by a cutie!
description:
Can you find love working at a supermarket?

Go through the daily work routines of Lucy. Restocking shelves, helping customers and... staying in the store. You might find someone you'll like!

Controls

Arrow keys, WASD: Move character around and move cursor around
C, Space, Enter: Accept and progress text
X, BackSpace, Left Shift: Cancel and run
Escape: Pause the game
F: Toggle fullscreen
P: Toggle auto skipping of text
